children.value: Date Picker example using both $field-02 (top) and $field-01 (bottom)
Placeholder text should remain when the user clicks into the text input and gets a cursor. Once the user starts typing the hint text is replaced with the user input text.
Error messages appear below the input field and are always present while invalid.

Labels should be set in sentence case, with only the first word in a phrase and any proper nouns capitalized, and no more than three words.

children.value: Spacing for Date Picker | px / rem
There are two types of time pickers; a 12-hour and 24-hour time picker. The 12-hour Time Picker is accompanied by a time period (am/pm) input, while the 24-hour clock is not.
_Structure and spacing for a Time Picker | px / rem_
